about.headline: About Me
about.description: Hi, I’m Kai Schulz, a Frontend Developer based in Pforzheim. Driven by my passion for IT and its endless possibilities, I focus on creating visually appealing and intuitive websites and applications.

content.paragraph1: I am flexible and work efficiently both on-site in Pforzheim and remotely. Always open to new challenges, I continuously seek opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills.
content.paragraph2: I am open-minded and always eager to take on new challenges to continuously enhance my knowledge and skills.
content.paragraph3: For me, programming is more than just writing code – it’s a creative way of solving problems. I enjoy transforming complex technical requirements into simple, user-friendly solutions, helping my clients achieve their goals and bring their visions to life.

skills.headline: Skills
skills.description: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, utilizing a wide range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
skills.paragraph: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to building on my existing knowledge and taking on new challenges.
skills.bubble: I have a special interest in learning

projects.headline: Featured Projects
projects.paragraph: Explore a selection of my work here – interact with the projects to see my skills in action.

join.name: Join
join.description: Join is a simple drag-and-drop Kanban board, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling you to manage contacts and tasks.

sharky.name: Kai the Shark
sharky.description: Kai the Shark is a 2D side-scroller browser game where you navigate a shark through dangerous waters and fight enemies with various attacks.

bubble.name: Pokedex
bubble.description: Pokedex is a website that retrieves and displays information about Pokémon and their attributes via the Poke API.

testimonials.headline: What My Colleagues Say About Me

t1.name: Mehmet Deliaci
t1.text: I worked with Kai on the Join project. With his reliable work ethic and creative ideas, he significantly contributed to the success of our project. I was especially impressed by his ability to solve complex tasks efficiently while keeping the team in focus.

t2.name: Denis Dudda
t2.text: Working with Kai has always been a pleasure! His energy, communication, and enthusiasm have constantly driven the project forward. I'm looking forward to more exciting collaborations in the future!

t3.name: David Lehnartz
t3.text: Working with Kai was always a rewarding experience. With his solution-oriented approach, he made a significant contribution to the success of our project, while motivating the team with creative ideas and a positive attitude.

contact.headline: Let’s Work Together!
contact.solve: Is there a problem I can solve?
contact.paragraph: Contact me through this form – I’m excited to hear from you, learn about your ideas, and contribute to your projects with my work.

disclaimer.headline: LIABILITY
disclaimer.p1: We are responsible for the contents of our internet pages in accordance with the general laws, particularly § 7 para. 1 of the Telemedia Act. All content is created with the utmost care and to the best of our knowledge. As far as we refer to third-party websites via hyperlinks on our internet pages, we cannot guarantee the continuous currentness, accuracy, and completeness of the linked content, as these contents are outside our area of responsibility and we have no influence on their future design. If you consider any content to violate applicable law or be inappropriate, please inform us.
disclaimer.p2: The legal notices on this page as well as all questions and disputes related to the design of this website are subject to the law of the Federal Republic of Germany.

data.p1: You can find our data protection information at

owner.p: The texts, images, photos, videos, or graphics on our website are generally protected by copyright. Any unauthorized use (especially reproduction, editing, or distribution) of these copyrighted contents is therefore prohibited. If you intend to use these contents or parts thereof, please contact us in advance using the above details. If we are not the holders of the required copyright usage rights, we will endeavor to establish contact with the rights holder.
